query:
SELECT 1 as exists_check
                FROM ledger_atom la
                JOIN ledger_entry le ON la.atom_hash = le.link_hash
                WHERE le.container_id = 'C.Jobs'
                  AND la.atom_data->>'type' = 'tool.called'
                  AND la.atom_data->'payload'->>'tool_call_id' = $1
                LIMIT 1
